scripts.dev: npm run build:remote && concurrently "npm run watch" "http-server -o -p 3000"
scripts.e2e: npm run build && start-server-and-test "http-server -p 3000" http://localhost:3000 "cypress run"
scripts.e2e:open: npm run build && start-server-and-test "http-server -p 3000" http://localhost:3000 "cypress open"
scripts.build: npm run build:remote && npm run build:local && npm run build:worker
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:local" "npm run watch:remote" "npm run watch:worker"
